HIV.SurveillanceTODO: description goes hereQuestionnairehttp://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/Questionnaire/HIV.Surveillance#0.3.0
1Client's first or given name0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
2Client's family name or last name0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
3The date and time of the client's visit0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
4The type of facility or service reporting using an HIV case report form0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
5Client is currently taking antiretroviral therapy0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
6Number of days from diagnosis to initiation on antiretroviral therapy (ART)0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
7Date when the client was first diagnosed to be at a clinical stage 10..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
8Date when the client was first diagnosed to be at a clinical stage 20..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
9Date when the client was first diagnosed to be at a clinical stage 30..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
10Date when the client was first diagnosed to be at a clinical stage 40..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
11Whether the client has active TB0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
12Unkown0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
13Whether self-tests distribution is community-based, facility-based, secondary distribution (for example, by index case, key population member, or antenatal care client)0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
14Type of site where self-test kit was distributed (for example, community outreach, workplace, or family planning clinic)0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
15Date case report form was completed0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
16Case reporting form was submitted0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
17Date case report form was submitted electronically0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
18Probable route(s) of transmission of HIV to client0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
19Client's partner is a member of a key population, which has an increased risk of HIV0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
20Linkage made from HIV testing to enrolment in care following an HIV diagnosis0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
21Type of case report that is received (new or update)0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
22The date on which the submitted case reporting form was received0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
23Date client was changed from a first-line to second-line ARV drug regimen (switch)0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
24Date on which ARV drug regimen for client was changed within the second-line regimen (substitution)0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
25Date and time when the sample was collected to test the client's HIV viral load0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
26Dates and results of all PCR tests, including the one that confirmed infection0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
27Infant had known exposure to HIV0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
28Whether a voluntary medical male circumcision procedure was performed0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
29Date on which a voluntary medical male circumcision procedure was performed0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
30Whether an adverse event was reported associated with a voluntary medical male circumcision procedure0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
31Complications resulted in death or hospitalization within 30 days of the procedure or permanent disability0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
32Severity of the adverse event0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
33Moderate0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
34Severe0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
35When the adverse event occurred0..1stringDefinition: http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/StructureDefinition/empty-id#Observation.value[x]
